response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,500,000 in your eyes. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this unique item to you for $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth, making it an exceptional deal for someone like yourself who appreciates its true value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will bring you immense satisfaction and benefit. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
